verbs.description: [V: Fearing] [ARG1: a blue wave] [ARGM-LOC: in the November midterm elections] , [ARG0: Republicans] are advancing a proposal to change the Senate ’s rules in order to speed up confirmations of President Trump ’s nominees . Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R - Ky . ) , a member of the committee , said Democrats are “ wasting the Senate ’s time ” by dragging out debate time even as lawmakers are n’t actively debating .
